short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds youtube videos and articles to your NABUU account

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to browse the web and add articles, images, and Youtube videos to your NABUU account. Your NABUU account and this extension will help expedite your foreign language learning process. 


Why NABUU?
Not everyone has the opportunity to travel to another country to practice a foreign language. Instead, you can use NABUU.  NABUU allows you to collect different resources so you can simulate language immersion whenever you want! Choose between articles, images, videos and vocabulary so you can practice anywhere at anytime. 

Extension Features
-Add a website/article by just clicking the extension and selecting a language. 
-Add a Youtube video by just clicking the extension and selecting a language while on Youtube. 
-Add an image by opening the image in a new tab and just clicking the extension and selecting a language. 

Your added content will be added immediately to your NABUU account.
